subject: Horse Racing
Kentucky Derby
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
lead_paragraph: Mr Speaker took charge down the stretch to win the $200,000 Coolmore Lexington Stakes at Keeneland on Saturday and earn 10 points toward the Kentucky Derby, but he will not be part of the Triple Crown.
snippet: Mr Speaker took charge down the stretch to win the $200,000 Coolmore Lexington Stakes at Keeneland on Saturday and earn 10 points toward the Kentucky Derby, but he will not be part of the Triple Crown.
